channel.title: Line 1 line 2 stats
channel.description: ok i used a tut to make fireworks appear everytimeyou level up sayin " my thieving lvl is 2" or something like that. but at the chat screen were ir tells me my lvl it jsut says line 1 and line 2. how can i fix that?
